name: Backlink Checker SEO
author: metricbuzz, taniafi786

sections.description:
Backlink Checker Demo:

Have you ever wonder how your site is linking to other sites?
What content other bloggers are linking to your pages?
Backlink Checker shows an instant result of earned backlinks to your site.

Below is the guide showing users how to get a free Bing API Key:

** How the Backlink report data is shown?

The tool is using ‘Bing Web Search API’, you can sign up and get free 1000 report data for each month, if the search exceeds the free report data, then the tool will stop reporting until the start of the new month. You can also pay for the extra report API data.

Get a free Bing API Key here:

Demo API Key: 3e1c968176b844c7b61d7f80948e12be

Plugin Main Features are:

  1. The tool is great for any SEO & Marketing service business, your will find this tool useful to glimpse your site mentioned by others online.
  2. Mobile responsive
  3. Animated report graphic design
  4. Instant check up to 1000 earned external backlinks
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’

  2. Search for keyword ‘Backlink Checker SEO’

  3. Install the Plugin, then Activate it.

  4. Find plugin at the bottom of the left sidebar and Click on “Backlink Checker SEO” in Admin menu.

  5. Input the Demo API Key, site URL to test out the report.

Please use this Screenshot for reference:
http://metricbuzz.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/backlink-checker-plugin.png
sections.faq:
We want to keep you updated and answer your questions!

Hi, this is newly created Backlink Checker SEO WordPress Plugin.
if you have any questions, please mention the Plugin name and contact us below:

Visit https://www.metricbuzz.com/en/contact for all FAQ information about this plugin.
